data.prayer: Over 0 percent of the people of Nukunonu are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nukunonu, Tokelau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Nukunonu, Tokelau. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Nukunonu, Tokelau.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Nukunonu to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Nukunonu
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Nukunonu, Nukunonu, Tokelau.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Nukunonu to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Nukunonu will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nukunonu, Tokelau has a population of 400.

We estimate Nukunonu has 14 people who might know Jesus, 386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 0 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Nukunonu, Tokelau not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
